long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly clean your browsing data for any website with just one click or a quick keyboard shortcut. Wipe Clean helps you maintain your privacy effortlessly.

Key Features:

- üßπ One-Click Cleaning: Instantly remove cookies and browsing history for the current website.
- üîí Privacy Protection: Ensure your browsing data doesn't linger after you're done with a site.
- üñ±Ô∏è User-Friendly: Clean with a single click on the extension icon or use a keyboard shortcut.
- ‚å®Ô∏è Keyboard Shortcut: Use Alt+X (Windows/Linux) or Option+X (Mac) for quick access.
- üóëÔ∏è Tab Management: Automatically close all tabs from the same domain after cleaning.
- üöÄ Lightweight: Minimal impact on your browser's performance.

How It Works:

1. Click the Wipe Clean icon or use the keyboard shortcut when you're ready to leave a website.
2. Watch as Wipe Clean removes cookies, clears history, and closes related tabs.
3. Enjoy peace of mind knowing your browsing data is clean!

Perfect for privacy-conscious users, shared computers, or anyone who wants to keep their browsing history tidy. Wipe Clean is your simple solution for on-demand privacy protection.

Take control of your digital footprint with Wipe Clean today!

Note: This extension respects your privacy and does not collect or store any personal data.
